I think that's wrong...\""},{"lineNumber":95320,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あんた……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You...\""},{"lineNumber":95321,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふーむ、とにかくこいつはやってないと」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, anyway, this one didn't do it.\""},{"lineNumber":95322,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes.\""},{"lineNumber":95323,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こいつが犯人だった時はどうする？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"What will you do if she actually was the culprit?\""},{"lineNumber":95324,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そのときは……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"In that case...\""},{"lineNumber":95325,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ペルエレは私の秘書です。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Peruere is my secretary."},{"lineNumber":95326,"originalJapaneseLine":"　秘書の不手際は私の責任。","translatedEnglishLine":"A secretary's mistakes are my responsibility."},{"lineNumber":95327,"originalJapaneseLine":"　責は私一人がちゃんと負います」","translatedEnglishLine":"I alone will properly take the blame.\""},{"lineNumber":95328,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほう？　何をする？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Oh? What will you do?\""},{"lineNumber":95329,"originalJapaneseLine":"「どのようにでも……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"However you like..."},{"lineNumber":95330,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランス様のお気の済むように」","translatedEnglishLine":"As Lord Rance wishes.\""},{"lineNumber":95331,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、あ、ちょ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh, ah, wait...\""},{"lineNumber":95332,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いいんだな？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's alright, right?\""},{"lineNumber":95333,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい、私はペルエレを信じていますから」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, because I trust Peruere.\""},{"lineNumber":95334,"originalJapaneseLine":"「絶対にペルエレは犯人ではありません」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Peruere is definitely not the culprit.\""},{"lineNumber":95335,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ねっ、ペルエレ？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Right, Peruere?\""},{"lineNumber":95336,"originalJapaneseLine":"パーッと明るい笑顔でシーラがペルエレに振り返る。","translatedEnglishLine":"Sheela turned to Peruere with a bright, beaming smile."},{"lineNumber":95337,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":95338,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふっ、馬鹿ね……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph, how foolish...\""},{"lineNumber":95339,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ｱｯﾀﾘﾏｴｼﾞｬｰﾝ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Of course I’m not...\""},{"lineNumber":95340,"originalJapaneseLine":"「顔青ざめてないか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Isn't your face going pale?\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ギリギリセーーーーーッフ！）
（宝箱、つい隠し持っちゃった。
どうにかしてここから離脱を……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I need to find a way to escape from here...)
"Completely not giving any chance to let down my guard...
Hey, you thief over there, give it back."
"Eh!? You're treating me as the culprit right away!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あんた！　私が取ったとでも言うつもり！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You! Are you going to say I was the one who took it!?"
(I was the one who took it though...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「宝箱ー？　そんなもの知らないったら」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Treasure chest? I don't know anything about that."
(Even though I have it right now...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ペルエレ、本当に知らないの？」
そんなもん取るわけないじゃない」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There's no way I'd take something like that."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ペルエレは犯人ではないと思います」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't think Peruere is the culprit."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お前……こいつの言うこと信じるのか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You... do you believe what she's saying?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前科とんでもない数ある女だぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She's a woman with an incredible number of past offenses."
"Just because she has a criminal record,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 信じないのは……駄目だと思うんです……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: doesn't mean we shouldn't believe her... I think that's wrong..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふーむ、とにかくこいつはやってないと」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, anyway, this one didn't do it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こいつが犯人だった時はどうする？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What will you do if she actually was the culprit?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 秘書の不手際は私の責任。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A secretary's mistakes are my responsibility.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 責は私一人がちゃんと負います」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I alone will properly take the blame."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス様のお気の済むように」
「はい、私はペルエレを信じていますから」
「絶対にペルエレは犯人ではありません」
パーッと明るい笑顔でシーラがペルエレに振り返る。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheela turned to Peruere with a bright, beaming smile.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
